name: Gnome Man's Land
description:
A cool, 72h-made, gardening game with nice looking art. 3 cool music themes for the menu, day time and night time. 4 different plants with 3 growth stages each!

A plant's water bar depletes slowly, you need to water them so they can grow. But watch out! Too much water will cause damage to a plant. Also, damaged plants need to recover hp before they can grow again, so protect them from insects with the bug spray!

WASD to move.
Space to pickup objects or drop objects.
Press space next to a plant while holding the shovel to grab it and plant it elsewhere. (each plant has a specific terrain)
Hold Q next to a plant to water it with the watering can.
Hold Q next to bugs to kill them with the spray can.

Currently no way to finish the game, consider yourself a winner if you got all plants to adult stage (3rd stage).

Will be updated soon
